content: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/69079 adds a new unstable-only API to libstd: Layout::for_value_raw. I am fine with it now after some back-and-forth about the details of the documentation, but I feel someone from T-libs should also take a look. Any takers?
hm, no reaction... does that mean I can just r+ myself?

@RalfJ I'd personally say we can move forward, yes, though I might squash commits down -- I think @Simon Sapin is almost certainly not opposed to the API (fundamentally) so landing it as unstable is fine
(I'm not on libs to be clear)
I think it's fine to land for now. It's unstable anyways.
